name: Things That Go Bump In The Night
name_original: Things That Go Bump In The Night
description:
"Things that go bump in the night" is a 'find the hidden object' game where you take the role as a new guard who has to stop certain monster prisoners from escaping. You will need to use spotlights to find these monsters as they can only be seen when in the light. 

Can you find the monsters? Or is it time to find another job :)

P.S. Please play in fullscreen :)
